divs: Sighting DetailsI took a break during work and was standing out behind the restaurant, looking over the marsh. Three orange lights appeared, then two more appeared to the right, maybe a mile or two. I watched and rechecked later on. About thirty minutes they were there, in the same area. A year later, the exact same pattern, color, and number of lights, in the same area. A couple of coworkers saw it at the same time. The lights blinked out one at a time. Many people have reported this same thing.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Murrells Inlet
There were no other sightings in Murrells Inlet on or around July 15th 2010
Summary: Bright orange lights over Atlantic Ocean. A set of three, then to the right, a set of two more.
